H0.text: What was the name of the German encryption machine whose code was deciphered at Bletchley Park during World War II . **Lorenz

H1.text: What was the name of the German encryption machine whose code was deciphered at Bletchley Park during World War II . **SIGABA

H2.text: What was the name of the German encryption machine whose code was deciphered at Bletchley Park during World War II . **Tunny

H3.text: What was the name of the German encryption machine whose code was deciphered at Bletchley Park during World War II . ENIGMA

A4.text: British cryptologists decrypted a vast number of messages enciphered on Enigma.

A5.text: The Enigma machine was invented by German engineer Arthur Scherbius at the end of World War I.
